Animated Films.name: Cartoon Crossroads
Animated Films.description: Test your knowledge of classic cartoons and beloved characters! This quiz covers a wide range of animated icons, from comic strips to iconic films. See if you can navigate the world of animation!

questions.text: What animated character has a crush on the Little Red Haired Girl?
questions.hint: This character is a lovable loser from the 'Peanuts' comic strip.

questions.text: What animated character has a crush on the Little Red Haired Girl?
questions.hint: This character is a lovable loser from the 'Peanuts' comic strip.

questions.text: What is the name of the baby who appears in cartoons and comic strips with Popeye the Sailor?
questions.hint: This baby’s name is a playful reference to a vegetable Popeye loves.

questions.text: In the 1992 animated film 'Aladdin' what device does the hero use to travel from place to place?
questions.hint: This item is a fantastical mode of transport, often associated with Middle Eastern tales.

questions.text: What fictional character claims to be 'smarter than the average bear'?
questions.hint: This character is a picnic basket-stealing bear from Jellystone Park.

questions.text: What color is cartoon character Marge Simpson's hair?
questions.hint: Her tall, beehive hairstyle is a distinctive shade in 'The Simpsons.'

questions.text: What cartoon character traveled in a time machine with Mr. Peabody?
questions.hint: This character is a young boy who learns history through time-travel adventures.

questions.text: In the comic strip 'Peanuts' what is Schroeder known for doing?
questions.hint: This character is often depicted with a small musical instrument, inspired by Beethoven.
